org.bff.javampd

Class MPDPlaylist

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bff.javampd.MPDPlaylist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Playlist

    public class MPDPlaylist
extends Object
implements Playlist
    MPDPlaylist represents a playlist controller to a MPD server. To obtain an instance of the class you must use the getMPDPlaylist method from the MPD connection class. This class does not have a public constructor (singleton model) so the object must be obtained from the connection object.
    Author:
    Bill

      • loadPlaylist

        public void loadPlaylist(String playlistName)
                  throws MPDPlaylistException
        Description copied from interface: Playlist
        Loads the songs in the given playlist to the current playlist. The playlist name can be givin with or without the .m3u extension.
        Specified by:
        loadPlaylist in interface Playlist
        Parameters:
        playlistName - the playlist name
        Throws:
        MPDPlaylistException - if the MPD responded with an error
